popover.title: Enter your login
popover.content:
Login must contain:
  • at least 5 characters
  • Only Latin letters and symbols . _ -

popover.title: Enter valid E-mail address
popover.content: Enter e-mail by the following sample: name@domain.zone

popover.title: Enter your name
popover.content: The name must begin with a capital letter

popover.title: Enter your Last Name
popover.content: Last name must begin with a capital letter

popover.title: Choose your birth date
popover.content: Or enter it at the following format:<abbr title="12/31/2003">mm/dd/yyyy</abbr>

popover.title: Enter your phone number
popover.content:
Just provider MTS:
  • (050)XXX-XX-XX
  • (066)XXX-XX-XX
  • (095)XXX-XX-XX
  • (099)XXX-XX-XX

popover.title: Name of university
popover.content: Enter the name of the university, such as: Chernivtsi National University

popover.title: Start education
popover.content: Enter the year of admission to university

popover.title: Enter your password
popover.content:
Password must contain:
  • at least 8 characters
  • only letters, numbers and symbols! @ # $% ^ & *
  • at least one capital letter, a number, and one of characters! @ # $% ^ & *

login.maxlength: Please enter no more than 40 characters

email.invalidformat: Please enter a valid email address.

firstname.minlength: Name must contain more than 3 symbols
firstname.maxlength: The name must not contain more than 30 characters
firstname.bigLetterName: Enter a name with a capital letter

lastname.minlength: Name must contain more than 3 symbols
lastname.maxlength: Name must not contain more than 30 characters
lastname.bigLetterLastName: Enter the last name with a capital letter

beginEdu.required: Enter the year in the range 1950-2015
beginEdu.pattern: Enter the year in the range 1950-2015

finishEdu.required: Enter the year in the range 1950-2020
finishEdu.pattern: Enter the year in the range 1950-2020
finishEdu.checkBegin: Entry to university should not be greater than the date of graduation

graduated.pattern: Enter the correct name of university

repeatpassword.equalTo: Please enter the same value again.
